# sonatyperepo_security_user_token (Resource)

Manage User Token Configuration



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether or not User Tokens feature is enabled
- `expiration_days` (Number) Set user token expiration days (1-999)
- `expiration_enabled` (Boolean) Enable user tokens expiration
- `protect_content` (Boolean) Additionally require user tokens for repository authentication

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier (always 'user-tokens' for this singleton resource)
- `last_updated` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Existing User Token configuration can be imported as follows.
#
# NOTE: The Identifier (USER_TOKENS) in below example has no meaning and is just to comply with Terraform syntax.

# Example
terraform import sonatyperepo_security_user_token.user_tokens USER_TOKENS
```
